patterns: How can I apply for admission?
I'm interested in applying for admission.
How do I get admitted to TUP?
responses: To apply for admission, you can visit the University's website and complete the          online application form.
The admission requirements vary depending on the program you want to apply to. Check the University's website for more details.

Our admission process typically involves submitting an application (physically), providing academic transcripts, entrance exam, interview, and medical. Once you complete the application, it will be reviewed by the admission committee.
We're delighted to hear that you're interested in applying for admission! You can start the application by visiting the University's website and exploring the availble programs.
To get admitted, you will need to meet the admission requirements for your choosen program and submit a complete application.

patterns: What are the college department available?
What college department do you offer?
responses: The college department the we offer are College of Industrial Education (CIE), College of Engineering (COE), College of Liberal Arts (CLA), College of Science (COS), College of Architecture and Fine Arts (CAFA), and College of Industrial Technology (CIT). Check the University's website for courses/programs each department offers.
The available courses/programs can be seen in the University's website.
Check the University's website for more details about college departments or courses/programs.
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
